Text: What was your name, Klueless?  Anyways, yeah it seems a convoluted subject, and these people's are trying to offer help as they see it.  You don't have to use the one site and pay for lessons.  The documentary is addressing the larger issues of the whole civilization, in which case a meeting of leaders in politics and science and religion would have to come together and decide on a new calendar.  These types of think-tank issues are already being addressed.  So, I understand the sarcasm, but it is unnecessary.
